TopicTitle: Trying to find mod that I forgot the name of... Some sort of universe replacer

Articles.Content:
A long time ago, I had some sort of mod named in the ballpark of "Universalis Kerbol", which replaced most of the planets, changed ambient light in space, changed lens flares, etc, and put Kerbin in orbit around a gas giant. Help would be appreciated because I freakin' loved this mod.

Sorry if this post pisses you all off.

Alternis Kerbol:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/63536-0-23-Alternis-Kerbol-Release-thread-v0-1-Jan-3-New-version-cloud-update

I honestly have no idea if it still works; as it was last updated in 0.23.

EDIT: A recent post to the thread seems to suggest it might work in 0.90; don't take my word for it though.
Ok that's it, thanks for the extremely quick response
